abstract: Matthew Biben will now be general counsel for all of the bank’s consumer businesses, according to an internal memo.
snippet: Matthew Biben will now be general counsel for all of the bank’s consumer businesses, according to an internal memo.
lead_paragraph: JPMorgan Chase promoted Matthew Biben to general counsel for all of the bank’s consumer businesses, according to an internal memo on Tuesday. Mr. Biben joined JPMorgan Chase last March as general counsel, overseeing the bank’s mortgage banking operations.
